Title: Mickey and the Beanstalk
Genre: Animation, Short, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy
Writer: Joe Rinaldi, Bill Peet, Homer Brightman, Frank Tashlin
Actors: Walt Disney, Clarence Nash, Pinto Colvig, Sterling Holloway
Plot: A mysterious thief has stolen the prosperous Happy Valley's most prized possession: the musical Singing Harp. Can Mickey, Donald, and Goofy find the answer in the irritable Willie the Giant's magnificent castle up in the blue sky?
